Package com.simpligility.maven.plugins.android.configuration

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    VersionElementParser
    Interface for parsing version names into version elements.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Apk
    Embedded configuration of ApkMojo.
    BuildConfigConstant
    Configuration for a custom BuildConfig constant.
    ConfigHelper
    Helper for parsing the embedded configuration of a mojo.
    DeployApk
    DeployApk is the configuration pojo for the DeployApk, UndeployApk and RedeployApk mojos.
    Dex
    Configuration for the dex test execution.
    Emma
    Configuration for the emma test execution.
    Emulator
    Configuration for the Android Emulator.
    HeaderFilesDirective  
    Lint
    Configuration for the lint command.
    Manifest Deprecated
    Use ManifestMerger ManifestMerger in combination with ManifestMergerMojo
    ManifestMerger
    Configuration for the manifest update.
    MetaInf
    POJO to specify META-INF include and exclude patterns.
    Monkey
    Configuration for the monkey test runs.
    MonkeyRunner
    Configuration for the monkey runner tests runs.
    Ndk
    Configuration for an Android NDK.
    NDKArchitectureToolchainMappings  
    Program
    Configuration element inside MonkeyRunner configuration.
    Proguard
    Configuration container for proguard without default values.
    Pull
    Configuration for the integration test runs.
    Push
    Configuration for the integration test runs.
    RegexVersionElementParser
    Regex-based VersionElementParser implementation.
    Run
    Configuration for the Run goal.
    Sdk
    Configuration for an Android SDK.
    Sign
    Configuration for signing.
    SimpleVersionElementParser
    VersionElementParser implementing the old version generator behavior.
    Test
    Configuration for the integration test runs.
    UIAutomator
    Configuration for the ui automator test runs.
    Unpack
    Embedded configuration of UnpackMojo.
    UsesSdk
    Abstraction for uses-sdk tag in the Android manifest.
    ValidationResponse
    ValidationResponse wraps a validation message and result flag allows the using class to decide how to react to a validation failure.
    VersionGenerator  
    Zipalign
    Configuration for the zipalign command.
